learning_objective: Master basic Filipino for El Nido travel

days.title: Welcome to El Nido!
days.learning_objective: Master polite greetings and basic thank you
days.story_guidance: Focus on hotel arrival and first interactions

days.title: At the Hotel
days.learning_objective: Navigate hotel interactions and ask for locations
days.story_guidance: Cover check-in process and finding facilities

days.title: Getting Around Town
days.story_guidance: Focus on tricycle rides and local transportation

days.title: At the Restaurant
days.learning_objective: Order food and ask about menu items
days.story_guidance: Restaurant dining experience with local dishes

days.title: Island Hopping
days.learning_objective: Book tours and ask about activities and pricing
days.story_guidance: Beach tour booking and water activity arrangements

days.title: Shopping and Souvenirs
days.learning_objective: Shop for souvenirs and bargain prices
days.story_guidance: Local market shopping with price negotiation

days.title: Local Culture
days.story_guidance: Learning about local traditions and customs

days.title: Saying Goodbye
days.learning_objective: Express gratitude and say farewell appropriately

days.title: Buying gifts and local products
days.learning_objective: Enhanced Shop for souvenirs and bargain prices with sophisticated Filipino

days.title: Local island hopping and snorkeling adventures
days.focus: Local island hopping and snorkeling adventures
days.learning_objective: Day 10: Local island hopping and snorkeling adventures - Building on curriculum foundation

days.title: Ask about prices
days.focus: asking about prices and making purchases
days.learning_objective: Ask about prices politely and express price reactions

days.title: Order food and drinks
days.learning_objective: Order food and ask about taste and quality

days.title: Book tours and activities
days.learning_objective: Book tours and ask about schedules

days.title: Shop for souvenirs
days.learning_objective: Shop for souvenirs and negotiate prices

days.title: Sunset viewing and photography
days.focus: Sunset viewing and photography at scenic spots
